data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rafael Barbosa for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 5, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 7, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Rochinha of Guimaraes smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tondela's Tomislav Strkalj breaks free at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Salvador Agra (Tondela) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Artur Soares Dias awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Tondela.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
In the minute 15, Tondela's Rafael Barbosa gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Free kick Tondela.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Guimaraes.
Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Guimaraes, close to Tondela's area.
Tondela are coming forward and Tomislav Strkalj gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Tondela.
Tondela attack but Joao Pedro's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 20, Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Free kick Guimaraes.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
In the minute 23, Guimaraes's Marcus Edwards gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Tondela.
In Tondela, Yohan Tavares of Tondela is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 27, Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 29, Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tondela.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 33, Artur Soares Dias signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Tondela's half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Tondela's Rafael Barbosa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guimaraes drives forward and Bruno Duarte gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 42, In Tondela Guimaraes's Bruno Duarte is caught offside.
Artur Soares Dias awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
In Tondela Tondela attack through Salvador Agra. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Artur Soares Dias will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in Tondela.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 47, At Estadio Joao Cardoso, Joao Pedro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Rochinha of Guimaraes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
In the minute 49, Guimaraes drive forward but Marcus Edwards is judged offside.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 51, Artur Soares Dias signals a Tondela throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 54, Andre Almeida for Guimaraes has been booked by Artur Soares Dias and receives a first yellow card.
Pedro Augusto for Tondela is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Tondela.
Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Guimaraes have been awarded a penalty in Tondela...
In the minute 58, Andre Andre nets and Guimaraes now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Tomislav Strkalj of Tondela is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Tondela.
Bruno Duarte (Guimaraes) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Artur Soares Dias awards Tondela a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Tondela.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Tondela throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Great finish from Bruno Duarte to give Guimaraes a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 63, That's a fine assist from Rochinha.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Tondela.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 66, Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Tondela Tondela drive forward through Salvador Agra. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 68, Bebeto is on a sub for Jhon Murillo for Tondela.
The home team replace Abdel Jalil with Joao Mendes.
In the minute 69, Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Souleymane Anne is replacing Tomislav Strkalj for the home team.
Free kick Tondela.
Miguel Luis is replacing Andre Almeida for Guimaraes at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 71, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salvador Agra (Tondela) has been shown a straight red card by referee Artur Soares Dias.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tondela to check on Pepelu, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 74, Guimaraes's Pepelu looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Pepelu, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Nicolas Janvier is the substitute for Guimaraes.
Guimaraes make their second substitution with Ricardo Quaresma replacing Rochinha.
In the minute 76, Joao Henriques (Guimaraes) is making a third substitution, with Jacob Maddox replacing Marcus Edwards.
The home team have replaced Joao Pedro with Jaume Grau. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Tondela.
In Tondela, Souleymane Anne (Tondela) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 79, Tondela have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Throw-in high up the field for Tondela in Tondela.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 80, Rafael Barbosa for Tondela gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Guimaraes surge into the attack at Estadio Joao Cardoso but Nicolas Janvier’s header is off-target.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
Free kick Tondela.
The away team replace Bruno Duarte with Noah Jean Holm.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
Filipe Ferreira for Tondela gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Throw-in Tondela.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Guimaraes.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 89, Guimaraes's Nicolas Janvier is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Artur Soares Dias awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Tondela.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tondela pushes forward through Rafael Barbosa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In Tondela, Abdul Mumin (Guimaraes) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Guimaraes's Silvio is on target but unsuccessful.
The match has come to a close in Tondela. The final score is 0-2.
Guimaraes's Jacob Maddox has been booked in Tondela.
